title: Trial by Algorithm
story_summary: Rada exposes the BCI's hidden abuses on live city feeds and the Council faces public trial. Halden's last message, shown to all, demands transparency. People vote to end BCI control and the Council loses its power. Neighborhoods take charge as Stenograd begins to transform.

official.headline: Citizens' Forum Begins
official.anchor_line: A citywide forum convenes to discuss improvements to the Behavioral Compliance Index.
official.contextual_reframing: Public involvement ensures ongoing optimization and trust in governance systems.

official.headline: Council Testifies Live
official.anchor_line: Council representatives address citizens, sharing recent actions to maintain order and equity.
official.contextual_reframing: Transparent communication highlights the adaptability of our leadership and the system's strength.

official.headline: System Reset Underway
official.anchor_line: Council oversight ends as Stenograd transitions to a new era after public review of past practices.
official.contextual_reframing: Systemic renewal demonstrates Stenograd's resilience and the commitment to collective progress.

underground.headline: Secrets Exposed Live
underground.anchor_line: Testimonies flood in as voices break through the silence of the BCI.
underground.contextual_reframing: Real stories finally reach the surface. They can't hide what we've seen and lost.

underground.headline: Council Caught Out
underground.anchor_line: Emergency decisions by the Council made injustice even worse. Oksana Lintz admits it all on air.
underground.contextual_reframing: Those in charge panicked, and ordinary people paid the price. We see behind the screens now.

underground.headline: Regime Falls In Full View
underground.anchor_line: The truth is out. The BCI is ended, the Council brought down, and Halden's death was no accident.
underground.contextual_reframing: Stenograd stands at a reckoning. Transparency is only the beginning - justice comes next.
